contents.text: Thank you for calling No Means No Worldwide in San Francisco, where we work to create a rape-free world.
For information about our educational programs, press 1.
To learn about our elementary school curriculum, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our education team for elementary programs.

navigationGoals: I’d like details on schedule and pricing for your elementary school curriculum
I’d like to get information on your elementary school curriculum so I can propose it at our local military base school.
I need to speak with the elementary curriculum team to get API documentation for your e-learning modules.
I need details on your safety lessons for elementary-age children.
I'm interested in your elementary program—could you send me the curriculum outline and explain the core learning objectives?

contents.text: To hear about our self-defense workshops, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our self-defense workshop coordinator.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a self-defense workshop for my team next month
I want to sign up for an upcoming self-defense workshop to sharpen my skills as a veteran.
I want to connect with the self-defense workshop coordinator to obtain the iCal feed or scheduling API for your upcoming sessions.
I’d like information on how to enroll in a self-defense workshop.
I'd like to enroll in an upcoming self-defense workshop; can you tell me the schedule and techniques covered?

contents.text: To find out how you can donate or volunteer, press 2.
To make a donation to support our mission, press 1.
Thank you for your generosity. Please hold while we transfer you to our development team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to make a one-time donation today and get a tax receipt
I’d like to make a donation to support No Means No Worldwide’s programs.
I’d like to set up a recurring donation via your online payment gateway (e.g., Stripe integration).
I want to make a donation to support your mission.
I want to make a one-time donation by credit card and receive a tax receipt for my contribution.

contents.text: To inquire about volunteer opportunities, press 2.
Thank you for your interest in volunteering. Please hold while we connect you to our volunteer coordinator.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for weekend volunteer opportunities at your San Francisco office
As an ex-military veteran, I’m interested in volunteering with your organization and need details on how to get involved.
I’m interested in volunteering as a developer—can I discuss contributing to your open-source e-learning platform?
I’d like to volunteer—what roles are available?
I wish to volunteer—please let me know what roles are available and what training is required.
